name: tool-result-format-simplification
details: Remove redundant tool result wrapping/unwrapping. Make all handlers return CallToolResult format directly, eliminating the intermediate ToolResult format and conversion layer.

tasks.name: update-chat-completion
tasks.details: Update chat-completion.ts to return CallToolResult format directly instead of using createSuccessResult/createErrorResult helpers

tasks.name: remove-wrapper-conversion
tasks.details: Remove the conversion logic in tool-handlers.ts (lines 130-141) that extracts and re-wraps the result

tasks.name: cleanup-helpers
tasks.details: Remove createSuccessResult and createErrorResult from model-utils.ts since they're no longer needed

tasks.name: update-types
tasks.details: Update or remove McpToolResponse interface and any ToolResult type references

tasks.name: test-build
tasks.details: Run TypeScript build to ensure no type errors
